</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns normalized vector (unit vector, [[vectorMagnitude]] <template><title>=</title></template><template><title>=</title></template> 1) of given vector. <dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 19 Jul, 2014
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5| ffur2007slx2_5]]
<dd class="note">
(ArmA3 1.26) Algorithm:
<code>Vector = [x,y,z]; 
Result = [x/([[sqrt]] (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)), y/([[sqrt]] (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)), z/([[sqrt]] (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2))];</code>
In mathematics, a unit vector in a normed vector space is a vector whose length is 1.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
